channel.title: How do I make the death emote last longer?

item.title: How do I make the death emote last longer?
item.dc:creator: @Southbird Southbird
item.description:
@Southbird wrote:

I’ve added the Barrelchest NPC death emote, and it works fine when I’m the NPC, and do the emote. Video: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=35lu8pf&s=6

But when I spawn the NPC, and kill it, the death emote gets cut off. It doesn’t shows the part where the anchor gets smaller. Video: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=15h2004&s=6

So does anyone know how I can make the NPC death emote last longer? This is what I got under process, in NPCHandler.java

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1120) { npcs[i].animNumber = 6965; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make the death emote last longer?
